name: Onboarding New User
description: Workflow for onboarding a new user to the platform.

steps.name: Create User Account
steps.description: Create a new user account in the system.

steps.name: Send Welcome Email
steps.description: Send a welcome email to the new user.

steps.name: Assign Initial Tasks
steps.description: Assign initial tasks to the new user.

steps.name: Schedule Training
steps.description: Schedule a training session for the new user.
